chunks.text: Guys, in today's video, I will give you an exercise and whoever solves this exercise, I will give a shoutout to them.

chunks.text: And it will be based on the concepts we have studied in the Sigma Web Development course.

chunks.text: So, I am very excited to give you a question.

chunks.text: What are you doing here that I will make an index.html here and I will give you a question.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So, the question is, you are given 12 video files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: 12 files, 6 audio and 6 video.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And 6 video.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Design a website using HTML only and which shows these 12 files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: I will do a little toggle word wrap here so that you can see.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So what you have to do is that you have been given 12 files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And what is the name of those files?

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So I will tell you what is the name of those files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: 1.mp3, 2.mp3, all the way till 6.mp3.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: These are your mp3 files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Then you have 1.mp4, 2.mp4, all the way till 6.mp4.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: Okay, you have these files.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So all these files, these 12 files, you have to show by previewing.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So I hope it will be done.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: It's a very simple question.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And you guys comment quickly and write Challenge Accepted.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And you guys tell me in the comment section.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So I hope you guys will complete it.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And it's a very simple problem.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: I know a lot of people will say that it's very simple.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: I will select it and do Ctrl Forward Slash.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And what happens by doing Ctrl Forward Slash?

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: You can uncomment or comment.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So if I press Ctrl Forward Slash, then it will be uncomment.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: And if I press Ctrl Forward Slash again, then it will be comment.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: So you have to complete this website.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: It's a very simple problem.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player
chunks.text: It's a straightforward problem.

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.title: Exercise 1 - Pure HTML Media Player

chunks.text: Bye.
